mapper.sql: id, req_number, t_number, t_name, e_name, section, r_number, r_now_per, r_max_per, create_date, update_date, status, s_date, e_date, s_time, e_time, remark, attri_text01, attri_text02, attri_number01, attri_number02
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_e_apply
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT r_number FROM t_e_apply
e_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} or attri_text01 between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT * FROM t_e_apply t
t.req_number = #{reqNumber} or t.attri_text01 = #{reqNumber}

SELECT * FROM t_e_apply t
t.req_number = #{reqNumber} and t.s_date = #{date} or t.attri_text01 = #{reqNumber} and t.s_date = #{date}

SELECT * FROM t_e_apply t
t.req_number = #{reqNumber} or t.attri_text01 = #{reqNumber} and t.status = '申请提交(教师)'

SELECT r_number FROM t_e_applyfindExpDetailByT
((s_date BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate}) AND (s_time > #{sTime} AND s_time < #{eTime})) OR ((e_date BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{eDate}) AND (e_time > #{sTime} AND e_time < #{eTime})) AND e_date>=CURDATE()
mapper.insert: insert into t_e_apply (id, req_number, t_number, t_name, e_name, section, r_number, r_now_per, r_max_per, create_date, update_date, status, s_date, e_date, s_time, e_time, remark, attri_text01, attri_text02, attri_number01, attri_number02) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rNowPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rMaxPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attriText01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attriText02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attriNumber01,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attriNumber02,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update: update t_e_apply t set t.status = #{status} where t.req_number = #{reqNumber} or t.attri_text01 = #{reqNumber}

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
req_number = #{record.reqNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
